channel.title: Lightning Round Talks
channel.description:
The lightning talk session for #meeting:apconf2020 is scheduled on **Sunday 4th**.
Room: https://bbb.fosshost.org/b/mor-qfh-vv1-ivq
Lightning round talks will be under 5 minutes long and will hopefully include summaries of the BoF sessions as well as individual topics. Since a lot of the lightning round talks will include content from the same day's BoFs, we can't require early submission of slides etc, so you can share your screen on Big Blue Button if you'd like to include slides.
### Talk #-2: @mlemweb https://socialhub.activitypub.rocks/t/summary-of-the-fediverse-as-an-educational-platform-bof/1058/2
### Talk #-1: @strypey - https://fediverse.space
### Talk #0: @cjs Summarizing these BoF: * [Discovery for Interoperability](https://socialhub.activitypub.rocks/t/discovery-for-interoperability/992/) * [The ActivityPub Test suite](https://socialhub.activitypub.rocks/t/the-activitypub-test-suite/996) * [Implementing ActivityPub Client-to-Server](https://socialhub.activitypub.rocks/t/implementing-activitypub-client-to-server/981)
### Talk #1: @how summarizing - https://socialhub.activitypub.rocks/t/scaling-up-cooperation/837 - https://socialhub.activitypub.rocks/t/intermapping/838
### Talk #2: @lain Migrating servers from one AP server to another
### Talk #3: SNAC_Steffen on Interusability
## Recording available! https://conf.tube/videos/watch/4a431c74-b594-4d0f-bef6-f0ee4455bee2

item.title: Lightning Round Talks
item.dc:creator: system
item.description:
The lightning talk session for #meeting:apconf2020 is scheduled on Sunday 4th.

Room: https://bbb.fosshost.org/b/mor-qfh-vv1-ivq

Lightning round talks will be under 5 minutes long and will hopefully include summaries of the BoF sessions as well as individual topics. Since a lot of the lightning round talks will include content from the same day’s BoFs, we can’t require early submission of slides etc, so you can share your screen on Big Blue Button if you’d like to include slides.

Talk #-2: @mlemweb Summary of "The fediverse as an educational platform" BoF

Talk #-1: @strypey

  • https://fediverse.space

Talk #0: @cjs Summarizing these BoF:

  • Discovery for Interoperability
  • The ActivityPub Test suite
  • Implementing ActivityPub Client-to-Server

Talk #1: @how summarizing

  • Scaling Up Cooperation
  • Intermapping

Talk #2: @lain Migrating servers from one AP server to another

Talk #3: SNAC_Steffen on Interusability

Recording available!
